CustomField.description: Code specifying the type of secondary insurance, such as Tricare, Medicare Secondary Black Lung, Medicare Secondary Worker's Compensation, etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Note: Required for Medicare Plans Only
CustomField.label: Secondary insurance type code

value.fullName: Medicare Secondary Working Aged Beneficiary or Spouse with Employer Group Health Plan Medicare Secondary End-Stage Renal Disease Beneficiary in the Mandated Coordination period
value.label: Medicare Secondary Working Aged Beneficiary or Spouse with Employer Group Health Plan Medicare Secondary End-Stage Renal Disease Beneficiary in the Mandated Coordination period

value.fullName: Medicare Secondary No-fault Insurance including Auto is Primary
value.label: Medicare Secondary No-fault Insurance including Auto is Primary

value.fullName: Medicare Secondary Public Health Service (PHS) or Other Federal Agency
value.label: Medicare Secondary Public Health Service (PHS) or Other Federal Agency

value.fullName: Medicare Secondary Disabled Beneficiary Under Age 65 with Larger Group Health Plan (LGHP)
value.label: Medicare Secondary Disabled Beneficiary Under Age 65 with Larger Group Health Plan (LGHP)

value.fullName: Medicare Secondary Other Liability Insurance is Primary
value.label: Medicare Secondary Other Liability Insurance is Primary
